articles.description: The DMC token will promote Dominica’s national and cultural heritage—and utilize the mechanics of a ‘fan token,’ in a first for a country.
articles.title: Dominican Government Partners With Tron To Launch Dominica Coin

articles.description: SOL is taking a harder hit than Bitcoin or Ethereum today, falling to a four-month low.

articles.description: Theft and exploits dipped with markets over the summer. Now, hacker activity has spiked again, according to Chainalysis.
articles.title: Stolen Crypto Total Hits $3B as Hackers Reemerge After Quiet Summer: Chainalysis

articles.description: StarkWare's president Eli Ben-Sasson shared his vision of how a three-layered system can further scale the Ethereum network.
articles.title: Ethereum Merge ‘Sets Precedent for Further Change’: StarkWare President Ben-Sasson

articles.description: Bitcoin has followed the stock market—again—following the release of the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics' consumer price index (CPI).
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Continue Tumble Following Hot Inflation Numbers

articles.description: The world's largest cryptocurrency Bitcoin is on a downward trend again on Thursday, falling to a three-week low below $19,000.
articles.title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $19,000 Ahead of Fresh U.S. CPI Report

articles.description: Noted online crypto sleuth "ZachXBT" played a key role in helping French authorities uncover the fraudulent Bored Ape NFT scheme.
articles.title: Five Charged in France With $2.5M Fraud Targeting Bored Ape NFT Owners

articles.description: A letter from Elizabeth Warren and six other Democrat senators demands financial and operational information about Bitcoin mining in Texas.
articles.title: Elizabeth Warren Calls Texas 'Deregulated Safe Harbor' for Bitcoin Miners

articles.description: Over the past 24 hours, tokens underpinning popular DeFi protocols like SushiSwap and Lido Finance have taken a battering.
articles.title: Sushi, Lido Finance Drop 10% as Top DeFi Tokens Plunge

articles.description: Firms active in crypto are concerned about their reputation, but those coming in care more about mitigating risk.
articles.title: Coin Metrics CEO: Big Banks 'Want In' on Crypto—When It’s More Regulated

articles.description: The FTX CEO took the DeFi community to task for putting too much trust in oracles.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried on the Mango Markets Hack: ‘Make Up Your Own Damn Mind’

articles.description: The CPI report will be released tomorrow. Stocks have taken a hit, but Bitcoin remains more resilient—so far.
articles.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady as Market Awaits Pivotal Inflation Data

articles.description: The federal suit could highlight conflicting statements from federal agencies as to Ethereum’s national status.
articles.title: Coin Center Sues Treasury Over Tornado Cash Ban

articles.description: The “move-to-earn” app strenuously denies reports that it is being left behind in a larger company transition.
articles.title: Crypto Fitness App STEPN Denies Layoff Reports

articles.description: Bitcoin mining reserves have dropped to just 1.91 million BTC, the lowest level since February 2010.
articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Reserves Are at a 12-Year Low—Here’s Why

articles.description: The company last month received regulatory approval to register in France as a digital asset service provider.
articles.title: Crypto.com Follows Binance Into France, Invests $145M in Paris HQ

articles.description: Stablecoins do what Bitcoin was expected to do, argues Leshner, adding that “if left to their own devices, they will win and conquer everything.”
articles.title: Regulators Are Targeting Stablecoins Due to ‘Crazy Product Market Fit’: Compound’s Robert Leshner

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The Moran hard fork seeks to amend several issues on the BNB Chain stemming from its $100 million hack last week.
articles.title: BNB Chain Upgrade Restores Cross-Chain Transfers Following Binance Bridge Hack

articles.description: The Mango Market hacker is now using looted governance tokens to vote in the project’s DAO about how best to resolve the hack.
articles.title: Mango Hacker Uses Stolen Funds to Pit Community Against Developers

articles.description: The Custodia Bank CEO accused the Fed of hypocrisy for inaction on her bank's master account application as Federal Reserve-supervised BNY Mellon launches crypto custody.
articles.title: Custodia’s Caitlin Long Blasts Fed Over BNY Mellon Entering Crypto

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Crypto exchange Binance has built a specialist team to teach law enforcement officers about the ins and outs of cryptocurrency.
articles.title: How Binance Is Training Law Enforcement Around the World to Combat Crypto Crime

articles.description: Offchain Labs today announced the purchase of Prysmatic Labs, consolidating two major Ethereum players.
articles.title: Arbitrum’s Owners Acquire Key Ethereum Development Team

articles.description: Grayscale slammed the SEC for not applying its standards evenly to spot Bitcoin ETFs and Bitcoin futures-based ETFs.
articles.title: 'No Justification' for SEC to Deny Bitcoin Trust Conversion Into ETF: Grayscale

articles.description: As the crypto bear market’s grip tightens, several major Layer-1 coins are down heavily in the last seven days.
articles.title: Layer-1 Blockchains Solana, Cardano, Avalanche Down 8% Over the Week

articles.description: The latest hack comes less than a week after BNB Chain lost $100 million.
articles.title: Solana DeFi Trading Platform Mango Markets Loses $100M in Hack

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The chill on stablecoins has thawed, Armanino told Decrypt, as banks have again started exploring issuing their own.
articles.title: Crypto Bankruptcies Have Generated a Wave of New Accounting Clients for Armanino

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Zuckerberg reiterated that Meta won’t build the metaverse alone, but stopped short of saying the firm will fully embrace Web3 technologies.
articles.title: An ‘Open, Interoperable’ Metaverse is ‘Better for Everyone’: Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The largest NFT marketplace now offers art on seven blockchains, including the “smol” world of Avalanche.
articles.title: OpenSea Adds Avalanche NFT Support

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Space and Time CEO reveals why Microsoft backed a decentralized data warehouse during a bear market.
articles.title: How a Web3 Data Storage Startup Got Microsoft to Invest

articles.description: The MPLX token hit a new low price just weeks after launch, hours after Metaplex offered up 40 million tokens for NFT buyers.
articles.title: Metaplex Token Plunges 68% After Adding Solana NFT Collectors to Airdrop

articles.description: The denial comes after two delays and a prior ruling against BZX on the same grounds.
articles.title: SEC Rejects WisdomTree Bitcoin Spot ETF Application—Again

articles.description: The new feature saves searchers a visit to Etherscan, returning balances directly in your search results.
articles.title: You Can Now Google the Balances of Ethereum Addresses

articles.description: Some APE holders are cashing out following word that the SEC is probing Yuga Labs over potential securities violations.
articles.title: ApeCoin Sinks 10% After Report of SEC Probe Into Bored Apes Creator Yuga Labs

articles.description: Bittrex violated multiple sanctions programs and failed to adequately guard against money laundering, according to the Treasury Department.
articles.title: Treasury Fines Crypto Exchange Bittrex $53 Million for Sanctions Violations

articles.description: Yuga Labs is reportedly being investigated over the sale of Bored Ape NFTs and distribution of ApeCoin.
articles.title: SEC Investigating Bored Ape Creator Yuga Labs Over Securities Violations: Report

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The BNY Mellon crypto custody service means the bank will store clients' private keys and provide bookkeeping on their BTC and ETH.
articles.title: BNY Mellon Launches Bitcoin, Ethereum Custody Services for Investment Firms

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Google will let a "handful" of customers pay for its cloud services using cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum via Coinbase Commerce.
articles.title: Google Cloud to Let Users Pay With Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin via Coinbase

articles.description: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko

articles.description: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.
articles.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022

articles.description: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.
articles.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment

articles.description: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now

articles.description: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.
articles.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do

articles.description: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.
articles.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk

articles.description: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."
articles.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs

articles.description: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.
articles.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022

articles.description: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.
articles.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2

articles.description: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.
articles.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.
articles.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps

articles.description: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.
articles.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder

articles.description: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.
articles.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."
articles.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps

articles.description: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.
articles.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY

articles.description: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.
articles.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'

articles.description: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.
articles.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT

articles.description: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how the Layer-1 blockchain competes with Ethereum and other chains, how it's a multi-chain future, how people misunderstood what the Ethereum merge was going to mean, and how to onboard more people into Web3.
articles.title: Fantom Foundation CEO: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed—But Not 20 of Them

articles.description: Izzy Howell, a former core contributor at Solana derivatives protocol Cypher, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 what she's up to now: a streetwear and lifestyle brand called PussyDAO that will soon launch Solana NFTs tied to physical apparel.
articles.title: Why Izzy Howell Left Solana Derivatives Protocol Cypher to Launch an NFT Apparel Brand
